Package com.SDD.structure

Class PSTNode

java.lang.Object
com.SDD.structure.PSTNode
public class PSTNode extends Object
A class representing a node in a priority search tree. A PSTNode contains a Segment object, a median value, and pointers to its left and right children.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    PSTNode(Segment segment)
    Constructs a PSTNode with the given Segment object and null left and right child nodes.
    PSTNode(Segment segment, PSTNode leftChild, PSTNode rightChild)
    Constructs a PSTNode with the given Segment object, left child node, and right child node.
